name: @lad-sapienza/scms
description: A simple starter to get up and developing quickly with Gatsby 5 and Bootstrap 5

scripts.upgrage-main: command -v rsync >/dev/null && mkdir tmp && wget https://github.com/lab-archeologia-digitale/sCMS/archive/refs/heads/main.zip -O tmp/scms.zip && unzip tmp/scms.zip -d tmp/ && rsync -a  --exclude .cache --exclude .env.development --exclude .git --exclude .gitignore --exclude gatsby-config.js --exclude node_modules --exclude public --exclude README.md --exclude tmp --exclude src/usr --exclude static --delete tmp/sCMS-main/ . && rm -rf tmp
scripts.upgrage-dev: command -v rsync >/dev/null && mkdir tmp && wget https://github.com/lab-archeologia-digitale/sCMS/archive/refs/heads/dev.zip -O tmp/scms.zip && unzip tmp/scms.zip -d tmp/ && rsync -a  --exclude .cache --exclude .env.development --exclude .git --exclude .gitignore --exclude gatsby-config.js --exclude node_modules --exclude public --exclude README.md --exclude tmp --exclude src/usr --exclude static --delete tmp/sCMS-dev/ . && rm -rf tmp
